emuInput.TitMainTitle: Pomtons Club members, including La Vera Edwards, Delores Canway, Jean Cage, Mangie Gupton, sponsor Dorothy Reed, Lavenia Jackson, Bertha Richardson, Doris Harper, Dorothy Clark, Irene Owens, Helen Davis, Rose Marie Walls, and Elizabeth Britton, gathered for party at Butlers' Club, 500 Maryland Avenue, Shadyside
emuInput.CatDescriptText: Cutline of related image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, January 4, 1941, pg. 5, reads: "The Young, Glamorous Pomptons [Pomtoms] Have Gay Party - The Pomptons [sic], pictured here, gave a gay party at the Butlers' club. La Vera Edwards, Delores Canway, Jean Cage, Mangie Gupton, Mrs. Dorothy Reed (sponsor), Lavenia Jackson, Bertha Richardson, Doris Harper, Dorothy Clark, Irene Owens, Helen Davis, Rose Marie Walls, Elizabeth Britton."
